content: **materials ** * 1 ball or skein lily cotton yarn balls sugar & cream in yellow * 1 ball pearl cotton size 5 pink * 1 ball pearl cotton size 5 white * 5 colors of six-stranded embroidery floss shaded greens lavender dk rose med blue & dark yellow * size 0 crochet hook * size 5 crochet hook * bone ring for hanger
